findLastFile

public static java.io.File findLastFile(java.lang.String parent,
                                        java.lang.String subDir,
                                        int id)
Find the most recent file in the specified dirname for contact idper. The name of this file must match the following pattern : ^.*[0-9]*\..*$.

Parameters:
parent - parent directory name
subDir - actual directory name
id - contact id
Returns:
a file if at list one is found, null otherwise.
